item.title: How to deploy a Hugo project to GitHub Pages with GitHub Actions
item.description: Over the years I have tried many static site generators to help manage my personal site and other projects. Recently, I decided I wanted to find a setup that utilized github pages and did not rely on any local tooling for building or deploying my site. I really liked how easy it was to use Hugo and once I found this great little project GitHub Actions for Hugo I knew I had a solution.
